title: "Brain signals ‘speak’ for person with paralysis"
excerpt: "A man unable to speak after a stroke has produced sentences through a system that reads electrical signals from speech production areas of his brain, researchers report this week. The approach has previously been used in nondisabled volunteers to reconstruct spoken or imagined sentences."
